field.name: OptionOldStyleUI
field.label: Enable Old UI
field.tooltip: Use the original UI (restart required).

field.name: OptionMinimizedUI
field.label: $$43332$$Enable Minimized UI
field.tooltip: $$43333$$Turn on to minimize the screen space and information of the main UI.

field.name: OptionMinimizedChatUI
field.label: $$45745$$Enable Minimized Chat UI
field.tooltip: $$45746$$Turn on to disable the detailed player communication UI in team games.

field.name: optionuishowtraining
field.label: $$37043$$Show Unit Training Queue
field.tooltip: $$37044$$Show all the units that are training in all buildings.

field.name: optionuishowgametime
field.label: $$37045$$Show Game Time
field.tooltip: $$37046$$Display the game time.

field.name: optionuishowvillagertasks
field.label: $$37047$$Show Advanced Resource View
field.tooltip: $$37048$$Display more details on resources.

field.name: optionuishowscore
field.label: $$37049$$Show Score
field.tooltip: $$37050$$Show the score of the game

field.name: OptionAdvancedFormationUI
field.label: $$37051$$Turn on the Advanced Formation UI.
field.tooltip: $$37052$$Show advanced formation options.

field.name: OptionAdvancedUnitTypeInfo
field.label: $$69632$$Turn on the Advanced Unit Type UI.
field.tooltip: $$69633$$Show advanced unit type information.

field.name: OptionFriendOrFoeColor
field.label: $$37055$$Enable Friend or Foe Colors
field.tooltip: $$37056$$Show all players in friend or foe colors

field.name: OptionEnableRobustRollover
field.label: $$42097$$Show Advanced Tech Information
field.tooltip: $$42098$$Enables display of additional tech effects and statistics.

field.name: OptionShowHPOnAlt
field.label: $$65692$$(Alt) Shows hitpoint bars
field.tooltip: $$65693$$Holding (Alt) displays units hitpoints bars.

field.name: OptionInvertControlShift
field.label: $$66073$$Inverts Control/Shift functionality in Unit Select Panel.
field.tooltip: $$69621$$Inverts Control/Shift functionality in Unit Select Panel.

field.name: OptionSnapOnFindUnit
field.label: $$65766$$Find Hotkeys Snap to Unit.
field.tooltip: $$65767$$Using Find Unit Hotkeys will take you to it.

field.name: OptionSnapToUnitDelay
field.label: $$68333$$Threshold used on Snap to Unit.
field.tooltip: $$69623$$Threshold used on Snap to Unit.

field.name: OptionUIShowVisualControlGroups
field.label: $$68619$$Show visual control groups.
field.tooltip: $$69622$$Show visual control groups.

field.name: OptionWonderPowerUI
field.label: $$69367$$Enable Wonder Power UI
field.tooltip: $$69368$$Turn on to show the wonder power UI.

field.name: OptionTooltipEnableWorld
field.label: $$37059$$Enable World Tooltips
field.tooltip: $$37060$$Display tool tips in the game.

field.name: OptionTooltipWorldDispTime
field.label: $$37061$$Delay before the world tooltips display
field.tooltip: $$37062$$Delay before the world tooltips display.

field.name: OptionTooltipGameUIDispTime
field.label: $$37063$$Delay before the game UI tooltips display
field.tooltip: $$37064$$Delay before the game UI tooltips display.

field.name: OptionEnableIME
field.label: $$37066$$Enable IME
field.tooltip: $$37067$$Enable IME input

field.name: OptionSkirmishNickname
field.label: $$37423$$Nickname
field.tooltip: $$42384$$Set the player name that is used for single player skirmish and multiplayer LAN games.

field.name: OptionEasyDragMilitary
field.label: $$37070$$Enable Easy Drag Military
field.tooltip: $$37071$$Drag select will select only military units.

field.name: OptionScrollSpeed
field.label: $$37072$$Scroll Speed
field.tooltip: $$37073$$Adjust the scroll speed.

field.name: OptionCameraZoom
field.label: $$37080$$Zoom of Camera
field.tooltip: $$37081$$Control the in game zoom of the camera.

field.name: OptionCameraRotation
field.label: $$19359$$Allow Camera Rotation
field.tooltip: $$18435$$Select this option to toggle Camera Rotation.

field.name: OptionCameraInertiaRampTime
field.label: $$43200$$Camera Acceleration Time
field.tooltip: $$43201$$Adjust the time for the camera to accelerate to full speed when scrolling.

field.name: OptionRightClickEconOnly
field.label: $$42386$$Economy Gather Point Only On Right Click
field.tooltip: $$42387$$Select this option to make a right click set only the economy unit gather point.  Unselected, a right click will set military and economy unit gather points.

field.name: OptionAICanChat
field.label: $$38270$$Allow Chats
field.tooltip: $$38271$$Allows the AI to chat to you.

field.name: OptionESOPrivacy
field.label: $$43216$$Online Privacy
field.tooltip: $$43217$$Disables all incoming invites and whispers from users who are not in your Friend or Clan lists.

field.name: OptionLanguageFilter
field.label: $$37165$$Filter Chat
field.tooltip: $$37166$$Filter chat for profanity.

field.name: OptionShowChatNotifications
field.label: $$43382$$Show chat enter and exit notifications
field.tooltip: $$43383$$A chat message is displayed when a user enters or exits the chat lobby.

field.name: OptionSaveFilterSettings
field.label: $$45735$$Save Game List Filter Settings
field.tooltip: $$45736$$Remember the last Game List Filter Settings Selected

field.name: OptionChatSortByClans
field.label: $$46635$$Group chat names by clan
field.tooltip: $$46636$$This sorts people in clans together in the chat player list

field.name: OptionGrfxWindowMode
field.label: $$37123$$Windowed Mode
field.tooltip: $$37124$$Enable to run the game in a window instead of full screen.

field.name: OptionGrfxRes
field.label: $$37125$$Video Resolution
field.tooltip: $$37126$$High resolutions have greater detail but may reduce performance.

field.name: OptionGrfxSuperSample
field.label: Super Sample
field.tooltip: $$37126$$High resolutions have greater detail but may reduce performance.

field.name: OptionEnableVsync
field.label: $$37140$$VSync
field.tooltip: $$37141$$Enable to sync to vertical retrace.  Disabling VSync may increase frame rate but cause tearing.

field.name: OptionGrfxParticleQuality
field.label: $$37095$$Particle Quality
field.tooltip: $$37096$$High quality settings will produce more detailed particle effects, like smoke and splashes, while low settings will increase performance.

field.name: OptionGrfxParticleTracers
field.label: $$37099$$Tracer Effects
field.tooltip: $$37100$$Enable to display ballistic tracer effects.  Disabling may increase performance.

field.name: OptionObscuredUnitAlpha
field.label: $$37074$$Obscured Unit Alpha
field.tooltip: $$37075$$Controls the transparency of units obscured behind other objects.

field.name: OptionGrfxDynamicLights
field.label: Dynamic Lights
field.tooltip: Needs Tooltip

field.name: OptionGrfxClouds
field.label: Clouds
field.tooltip: Needs Tooltip

field.name: OptionGrfxAAQuality
field.label: $$41678$$Anti-alias Quality
field.tooltip: $$41679$$High quality anti-alias settings will reduce more jagged edges but also reduce performance.  Turn off for best performance.

field.name: OptionEnableBlooms
field.label: $$37144$$Bloom Effect
field.tooltip: $$37145$$Enable to enhance bright areas of world.  Disabling may increase performance.

field.name: OptionGrfxSSAO
field.label: SSAO
field.tooltip: Needs Tooltip

field.name: OptionGrfxFoliageQuality
field.label: Foliage
field.tooltip: Needs Tooltip

field.name: OptionGrfxShaderQuality
field.label: Shaders
field.tooltip: $$41648$$High quality settings provide more graphical detail and effects, while lower quality settings increase performance.

field.name: OptionGrfxWaterQuality
field.label: Water
field.tooltip: Needs Tooltip

field.name: OptionGrfxShadowDetail
field.label: Shadows
field.tooltip: $$37107$$High quality settings provide more detailed shadows, while lower quality settings increase performance.

field.name: OptionGrfxTextureQuality
field.label: Textures
field.tooltip: $$41651$$High resolution textures have more detail, while low resolution increases performance.

field.name: optionsoundonoff
field.label: $$37150$$Sound On
field.tooltip: $$37151$$Turn sound on or off.

field.name: optionsoundlevel
field.label: $$37152$$Volume
field.tooltip: $$37153$$Adjust the sound volume.

field.name: optionambientsoundlevel
field.label: $$37154$$Ambient Sound Volume
field.tooltip: $$37155$$Adjust the ambient sound volume.

field.name: optionSoundParamEQOnOff
field.label: $$37156$$Equalizer Effects
field.tooltip: $$37157$$Determines whether certain off-screen sounds can utilize special effect processing.

field.name: OptionSoundAllowTaunts
field.label: $$37083$$Allow Player Taunts
field.tooltip: $$37084$$Allow player taunts.

field.name: optionsoundchatvolume
field.label: $$41620$$Taunts and AI Chats Volume
field.tooltip: $$41621$$Adjust the taunts and AI chats volume.

field.name: optionmusiconoff
field.label: $$37159$$Music On
field.tooltip: $$37160$$Turn music on and off.

field.name: optionmusiclevel
field.label: $$37161$$Music Volume
field.tooltip: $$37162$$Adjust the music volume.
